author: Sneakerhead
text: The fact that you do not accept returns for sending the wrong size.
title: Poor customer service

author: I
text: Please don’t trust positive reviews that were written as a template. Stock x is horrible, non existent customer service. My data was hacked from stock x, beware! All these “positive” reviews showed up all in once all because stock x is going IPO public this June. Please don’t use stock x. Oh, and Stock X is still doing business with Belarus and Russia, do you want to support war in Ukraine???
title: Please don’t trust positive reviews…

author: William
text:
The only thing wrong with you delivery is, it is long overdue and I have been unable to connect with a human who can help me.
William Poteet
8170-946-04471

P.S. this was a present for my grandson and his birthday was April 14th.
title: The only thing wrong with you delivery…

author: Dimitar
text: I ordered a t-shirt and I never got it, Then I tried bidding on it again for a few day days the last sale was either 70$ or 60$ and my bid was 73$! What is this?!
title: I ordered a t-shirt and I never got it

author: RE
text: The slides have like a yellowish Stain all on them
title: The slides have like a yellowish Stain…

author: Kintal
text: Too much delays
title: Too much delays

author: Chris
text: Takes too long to receive ordered item. Been waiting for ordered item for two weeks. Because Stock X has to wait for seller to decide to ship the item to them for authentication. Before shipping… A inconvenience
title: Takes too long to receive ordered item

author: Denise
text:
It would be have to receive emails indicating that you received the order and a "workable" tracking system.  With a tracking system it would also allow the consumer to know when to expect the package. 
I had to email your company to find out the status of my order and then when I received a tracking number it did supply any information.  I opened my door and the box was there before the anticipated date but I don't know how long it was outside the door I do not use.
*My Grandson was very happy with the shoes so it was all worth it:)
Thank you
title: It would be have to receive emails…

author: Peter
text: I understand things happen, but I ordered a pair of University Blue Jordan 1's, first order gets cancelled for some reason. Then I order a second pair and have not received an update after two weeks and can't find any contact to receive an update.
title: I understand things happen

author: AB
text: My order was cancelled and refunded without any explanation
title: My order was cancelled and refunded…

author: owen
text: Order was cancelled 10 days after order was placed without any explanation
title: Order was cancelled 10 days after order…

author: Yonas
text: Well I haven’t received my package.
title: Well I haven’t received my package.

author: Steven
text: Over charged me
title: Over charged me

author: Sara
text: The shoes looked wonderful, however, I was so disappointed because one of the shoe laces had some sticky tape or something on it. The shoes were posted as brand new, no defects. Other than that, everything else was perfect. I was just a bit disappointed.
title: The shoes looked wonderful

author: KE
text: I really do not like that there are no exchanges at least for a different size.  Trying to sell something back is the biggest headache. It isn’t the best option
title: I really do not like that there are no…

author: Nyeela
text: No refund and now I'm stuck with shoes that r to little
title: No refund and now I'm stuck with shoes…

author: Dawn
text: We received shoes today and when purchasing these they said they were new condition and they are clearly not new condition. Scuffs on the shoe and the bottom they have clearly been worn. For 610 dollars I would have expected more.
title: We received shoes today and when…

author: 傳錡
text:
shipping too slow.
Novelship would be a better choice.
title: shipping too slow.

author: Bryan
text: Delivery prospective, was fantastic. However, being a special edition shoe, I recieved a plain generic box.  Doesnt seem right to me. I feel like I should have gotten the right shoe box.
title: Great delivery time....proper box ??

author: Elyse
text: I placed a bit and was outbid. I thought that meant I didn’t need to worry about it. Turns out they still end up selling you the shoes at your low bid price even if you don’t want them.
title: I placed a bit and was outbid…
